summary: The script aggregates pre‑computed acoustic feature files referenced in one or more TTS training manifests, computes mean and standard deviation values for each feature (e.g., pitch, energy) across the entire dataset and separately for each speaker, and writes these statistics to a JSON file.
business_intent: Generate normalization parameters required for training text‑to‑speech models, ensuring consistent feature scaling globally and per speaker to improve model convergence and voice quality.
